title: Bamboo
description: rubbing: negative image of a stalk of bamboo growing from LRC; stalk is broken off near top; cluster of bamboo leaves in LRQ; graceful, narrow branch with a few leaves grows from near broken top; inscription at R (in white against black background)
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
